name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube Shorts to normal Youtube Video

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just transform Youtube Shorts link to a normal video link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With just a click on the icon, this extension will automatically convert any YouTube Shorts link to a regular YouTube video link. This means that you'll have access to all the same features and functionalities that you would normally have with a YouTube video (like adding the video to a playlist).
